EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Master SubContractor Agreement - Eddie Fernandez (1320091430.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Eddy,
You are welcome. I found out from support there is no way to complete the re-enrollment by skipping the contract to get to the remainder of the information. You will need to first electronically sign, then complete the remainder of the process. Please let me know if you have any questions about this and when you finish reviewing the contract please email any questions you have or any proposed changes so I may look at them with our contracts team.
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Eduardo Fernandez [mailto:eddy_fern@yahoo.com] Sent: Monday, October 31, 2011 1:54 PM To: Nicolette Taylor; Pacelli, Denise Subject: Re: Master SubContractor Agreement - Eddie Fernandez
Thanks for keeping me in the loop. Please let me know when you have the MSA in place.
Best Regards,
Eddy Fernandez 770-605-5013
From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: "Pacelli, Denise" <Denise.Pacelli@daugherty.com> Cc: Eduardo Fernandez <eddy_fern@yahoo.com> Sent: Friday, October 28, 2011 2:26 PM Subject: RE: Master SubContractor Agreement - Eddie Fernandez Hi Denise,
Thank you for sending me your agreement. MBO Partners, Inc. is a consultant services company specifically set up to administer contract assignments for independent consultants. Individuals utilize our services in lieu of self-incorporating, and as such become our w2 employee. Our model avails them of many of the same benefits as self-incorporating but without the difficulties typically encountered in becoming a freelancer. For your purposes, we operate similarly to most of the staffing companies you may deal with, except that we do not recruit or find engagements for our consultants: they do that on their own. If you would like a more in-depth view of our services, please visit www.mbopartners.com.
With this in mind, Ive attached an amended contract with the changes highlighted. Here is an explanation of each change:
· Section 1b - We cannot warrant the services provided by the consultant
· Section 2a  We do not recruit nor interview our consultants
· Section 2c  We cannot warrant the consultants skill set.
· Section 2d  We do not staff nor recruit, and therefore cannot agree to replace any personnel
· Section 7c - We prefer to remove this requirement, as it is an additional cost to the consultant, however, if it cannot be removed, then we will be sure to obtain
· Section 8  We do not staff or recruit, but rather provide W2 services for independent consultants and are likely working with clients in the same industry and/or billing your clients for other consultants Therefore, we need to add the attached language to non-compete/solicitations so that we are not in immediate breach.
· Section 10  we prefer to use our standard indemnification language
If my changes are acceptable, please sign and fax or email the attached PDF version of the contract. Please dont hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and we look forward to working with you.
Have a great day,
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Pacelli, Denise [mailto:Denise.Pacelli@daugherty.com] Sent: Thursday, October 27, 2011 1:38 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Master SubContractor Agreement - Eddie Fernandez
Hi Nicolette,
Attached is a our master agreement that will need to be reviewed and executed. Once we have received this signed we will issue a PO for Eddie Fernandez to work at Norfolk Southern. We do not have a confirmed start date as of yet but it should be next week.
If you have any questions please feel free to call me.
Thank you,
Denise Pacelli Office Manager / Atlanta Branch
Daugherty Business Solutions 3438 Peachtree Road, Ste 950 Atlanta, GA 30326 Phone: 404-760-5400 Fax: 404-760-5402
